sent.orig: Eat wheat bread instead of white, wheat pasta instead of regular, brown rice instead white, etc.
sent.trans: 所以，吃些全麦面包代替白面包，全麦面食代替普通面食，糙米代替白米，等等。

sent.orig: The legislators should supply arts instead of luxuries; they should satisfy needs instead of desires.
sent.trans: 立法者应该提供艺术而不是奢侈品，应该满足人民的必需而不是人民的欲望。

sent.orig: Where possible, try taking the stairs instead of using the elevator, and walking instead of driving.
sent.trans: 那么只要有可能，能爬楼梯就别坐电梯，能走路就别坐车。

sent.orig: Instead, use a fruit oil, safflower, or sunflower oil instead.
sent.trans: 可以用水果精油，红花精油或者葵花精油代替。

sent.orig: Instead of opening two frames, why don't you get a second monitor instead?
sent.trans: 与其打开两个窗口，何不装第二台显示器呢？
